description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              • Market observation, recognition of trends in the language course and examination area
              
              • Planning, implementation and evaluation of marketing campaigns across all marketing channels
              
              • Development of a communication strategy for the electronic channels in cooperation with the respective departments
              
              • Contributing to the creation and maintenance of the website and the social media strategy (including the creation of texts, images, videos and editorial contributions)
              
              • Preparation and execution of launches in the individual distribution channels, especially in digital communication
              
              • Collaboration in the creation and revision of brochures, flyers, sample presentations
              
              • Cooperation in the preparation of events
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              • Completed business administration or journalistic studies or comparable education with completed training as a specialist in marketing or digital communication
              
              • 3 - 5 years of professional experience
              
              • Commitment that convinces with in-depth expertise
              
              • Strong customer focus, systematic work style, ambition and dedication
              
              • Experience in project management, compliance
              
              • User insights for social media, website content and MS Office
              
              • Good German or English knowledge in spoken and written language
              

              ** Your application:
              
              You are convinced that you will be able to fulfill this challenging task? Then we would be happy to meet you. Please send your application documents, stating the keyword “marketing” via VietnamWorks for a first preliminary discussion.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
